email_body: yes Ina Rangel 05/10/2001 05:47 PM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: Question? John, Do you think we need to see about sending an IT Tech for you and Maggi on Friday to make sure everything is working okay? If we do, we would have to pay for their travel expenses. It would be beneficial to you instead of having to be on the phone with IT for any problems. Let me know. -Ina
